message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $150. What do you think?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I believe I can come to an agreement of $120 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, could we agree on $125 for the product?
